results.title: Celebrate a Memorable Festive Moment at The Ritz-Carlton, Bali
results.description: Take part on the festive tradition with curated menu and rich Balinese culture for an unforgettable year-end holiday. BALI, Indonesia, Dec. 2, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- This year, The Ritz-Carlton, Bali, invites guests to experience and celebrate the most anticipated time of the year at the award-winning tropical beachfront resort. The resort has designed a range of exciting activities and a dining program to help guests reconnect with their loved ones during this year-end holiday. Highlights include special menus, wellness experiences, and family-friendly activities inspired by the resort's beautiful surroundings and rich Balinese culture. For culinary options, guests can enjoy the resort's five iconic restaurants and bars. Senses is located in the heart of the resort, offering an exciting selection that promises to satiate even the most discerning palate. The Ritz-Carlton Lounge and Bar is situated above Senses and provides a picturesque view of the Indian Ocean and the resort's landscape. The dinner-only Bejana offers Indonesian and authentic Balinese dishes and features a dramatic clifftop setting overlooking Nusa Dua and the ocean. For a beachfront restaurant, guests may opt for The Beach Grill for seafood and grill options or casual dining at the recently launched Missoni Resort Club at Breezes. "This year's festive celebration is truly remarkable as we celebrate our 10th Anniversary and just launch our exciting partnerships with Italian fashion house, Missoni to open the first Missoni Resort Club in Southeast Asia," said Go Kondo, General Manager of The Ritz-Carlton, Bali. "Our Ladies and Gentlemen are committed to providing genuine service and comfort while you stay with us for a memorable festive holiday," he added. As Christmas approaches, a variety of indulgent festive feasts are available, including a lavish Christmas Eve buffet with a Christmas Choir, a sumptuous Indonesian and International Christmas Brunch, and a four-course Christmas Dinner with stunning views of the Indian Ocean. Festive Afternoon Tea Indulge in a special themed Afternoon Tea, featuring a festive array of splendid savory snacks and sweet treats. The price is IDR 1,100,000++ for two. Available daily from 2 p.m. to 5 p.m. at The Ritz-Carlton Lounge and Bar from 1 - 31 December 2024. Christmas Eve Set Menu Dinner on 24 December 2024 Relish in a special set dinner to celebrate Christmas Eve. The four-course set dinner is made of freshly caught seafood from the Indian Ocean featuring locally sourced ingredients at The Beach Grill. The dinner available starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. The price is at IDR 1,680,000++ per person. Christmas Eve Balinese Buffet on 24 December 2024 Begin the Christmas festivities by gathering with your loved ones and indulge in a special-themed Balinese buffet at Bejana Restaurant. Starting from 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m., the buffet price starts at IDR 880,000++ per person, children dine free below three years and 50% off between four to twelve years. Christmas Eve Festive Buffet on 24 December 2024 Join the celebration and indulge your taste buds with a delightful international buffet, featuring live cooking stations with Sushi and Sashimi, Western, Asian, and Indonesian dishes, as well as a carving station at Senses restaurant. The buffet price is at IDR 1,000,000++ per person and 50% off for children between four to twelve years old. The buffet starts from 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. Christmas Day Brunch on 25 December 2024 Celebrate the excitement of Christmas with your family and friends while enjoying our delectable Christmas Day Brunch at The Beach Grill. The brunch is at IDR 1,000,000++ per person with 50% off for children between four to twelve years old. Brunch starts from 12 noon to 3 p.m. Christmas Day Indonesia Buffet Night on 25 December 2024 Enjoy a wide array of sumptuous Indonesian Buffet with specialties menu across the archipelago at Bejana, Bali's best Indonesian restaurant. The dinner starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. and the price is at IDR 880,000++ per person, children dine free below three years and 50% off between four to twelve years. Christmas Day Four-Course Set Menu on 25 December 2024 Tis' the season to cherish. Delight in an exceptional four-course set menu, showcasing classic French fine dining with a local twist, available exclusively this Christmas Day. The set menu price is at IDR 1,680,000++ per person. The dinner starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. Ring in the coming year with sumptuous dining options whether it is a sumptuous buffet or a curated set menu. Join the countdown celebrations at the stylish Missoni Resort Club Bali, with pass around bites and creative beverages then dance the night to the rhythm. Complete the festivities with a remarkable New Year's Day brunch, and all the fabulous facilities of this world class resort. New Year's Eve Set Menu on 31 December 2024 Usher in the New Year in style, savour a five-course set menu using flavors of the island combined with fresh ingredients and premium quality meat and seafood at The Beach Grill. The dinner starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. with live acoustic performance as entertainment. The price is at IDR 1,980,000++ per person and Ritz Kids menu is available. New Year's Eve Indonesia Buffet on 31 December 2024 Feast on a sumptuous Indonesian buffet spread specially curated by our talented culinary team to celebrate a memorable year-end at Bejana. The price is at IDR 1,000,000++ per person, children dine free below three years and 50% off between four to twelve years. Dinner starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. New Year's Eve International Buffet on 31 December 2024 Welcoming 2025 with us and experience a culinary adventure. Excite your senses with a myriad buffet selection of international flair and traditional delicacies at Senses. The price is at IDR 1,800,000++ per person, children dine free below three years and 50% off between four to twelve years. Dinner starts at 6 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. New Year's Countdown Celebrations and After Party on 31 December 2024 Ring in the New Year, The Ritz-Carlton Bali's style. Complete the night with a fabulous New Year countdown at Missoni Resort Club at Breezes with minimum spend on ala carte menu at IDR 1,500,000++ per person for seating from 6 p.m. to 10.30. Guest can opt to join the after party only, with minimum spend at IDR 625,000++ per person from 10 p.m. to 1.a.m. New Year's Day Brunch on 1 January 2025 Kick off a brand new year with a remarkable brunch experience featuring live stations, comforting soup, grilled premium seafood and meats, and delectable desserts at Missoni Resort Club at Breezes. The brunch price is at IDR 1,000,000++ per person, children dine free below three years and 50% off between four to twelve years. Take advantage of Dine and Earn redeem program by Marriott Bonvoy for guests that has been loyal to Marriott Bonvoy program, for more information, please visit Marriott Bonvoy. For reservation, please visit our website https://www.ritzcarlton.com/en/hotels/dpssw-the-ritz-carlton-bali/dining/ or email at rc.dpssw.restaurant.reservation@ritzcarlton.com ABOUT THE RITZ-CARLTON, BALI Built on a sprawling 12.7 hectares white beach front and elevated cliff-top settings, The Ritz-Carlton, Bali feature 313 oceanfront suites and villas, enjoying the unobstructed view of the Indian Ocean and the resort's lush garden. Completing the experiences, a glass elevator connects the cliff and the beach-front, five restaurants and bars, The Ritz-Carlton Ballroom and meeting facilities, a wedding chapel, as well as The Ritz-Carlton Spa. Ladies and gentlemen at The Ritz-Carlton, Bali is proudly presents the timeless charms of Indo-Balinese hospitality. ABOUT THE RITZ-CARLTON HOTEL COMPANY, LLC The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company, LLC of Chevy Chase, Md., currently operates 88 hotels in the Americas, Europe, Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and the Caribbean. More than 30 hotel and residential projects are under development around the globe. The Ritz-Carlton is the only service company to have twice earned the prestigious Malcolm Baldrige National Quality Award, which recognizes outstanding customer service. For more information, or reservations, contact a travel professional, call toll free in the U.S. 1-800-241-3333, or visit the company web site at www.ritzcarlton.com. The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ: MAR)
